QuestData.Title: The Thornspeaker Captive
QuestData.Description:
Good to know the old bear hasn't forgotten me.
Unfortunately, neither have the Drust. I was enjoying a peaceful afterlife before they showed up.
Do not bother trying to force open this cage. You can only unlock it with three separate keys, and each one is held by a different Drust commander.
They should be somewhere nearby. Find them.
QuestData.LogDescription: Rescue Kivarr from Eventide Grove in Ardenweald.
QuestData.RewardText: The Drust locked me in this cage and dragged Kivarr away! If you release me, I can show you where they went!
